m_szDocTitle: Number of eco-friendly cars in S. Korea spikes 29 pct in 2015
m_szDocSumamry: Print SEOUL, Feb. 14 (Yonhap) -- The number of eco-friendly cars in South Korea shot up almost 29 percent in 2015 from a year earlier amid the government's push to put more green automobiles on the road, data showed Sunday. The country had 180,361 registered eco-friendly vehicles as of the end of last year, up 28.6 percent from a year earlier, according to the data from the Korea Automobile Manufacturers Association (KAMA) and the transportation ministry. Hybrids were the lion's share of the representation with 174,620 units, a 27 percent jump from the previous year. The remainder were electri
